author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Build Perl bindings by default.
Allow overriding ENABLE_* settings for bindings from command line.
Use correct BDB configure flags for various branches.
Expect http:// test repositories in /tmp instead of /tmp/svn.
Various whitespace and other small fixes.

author: markt
msg: Revert previous fix for https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=47977 that caused regression https://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=48827 and implement an alternative fix

author: pderop
msg: added integration test for new BundleAdapterService annotation
